2021.journals_title: EURASIP Journal on Information Security, Volume 2021

papers.title: Use of SHDM in commutative watermarking encryption
papers.authors: Roland Schmitz
papers.abstract: SHDM stands for Sphere-Hardening Dither Modulation and is a watermarking algorithm based on quantizing the norm of a vector extracted from the cover work. We show how SHDM can be integrated into a fully commutative watermarking-encryption scheme and investigate implementations in the spatial, DCT, and DWT domain with respect to their fidelity, robustness, capacity, and security of encryption. The watermarking scheme, when applied in the DCT or DWT domain, proves to be very robust against JPEG/JPEG2000 compression. On the other hand, the spatial domain-based approach offers a large capacity. The increased robustness of the watermarking schemes, however, comes at the cost of rather weak encryption primitives, making the proposed CWE scheme suited for low to medium security applications with high robustness requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: SHDM代表球面硬化抖动调制，是一种基于量化从封面作品中提取的向量的范数的水印算法。我们展示了如何将SHDM集成到一个完全可交换的水印加密方案中，并研究了空间域、DCT域和DWT域中关于加密的保真度、鲁棒性、容量和安全性的实现。当应用于DCT或DWT域时，水印方案被证明对JPEG/JPEG2000压缩非常鲁棒。另一方面，基于空间域的方法提供了大容量。然而，水印方案增加的鲁棒性是以相当弱的加密原语为代价的，这使得所提出的CWE方案适合于具有高鲁棒性要求的中低安全性应用。
papers.title_zh: SHDM在交换水印加密中的应用

papers.title: Detection of illicit cryptomining using network metadata
papers.authors: Michele Russo, Nedim Srndic, Pavel Laskov
papers.abstract: Illicit cryptocurrency mining has become one of the prevalent methods for monetization of computer security incidents. In this attack, victims’ computing resources are abused to mine cryptocurrency for the benefit of attackers. The most popular illicitly mined digital coin is Monero as it provides strong anonymity and is efficiently mined on CPUs.Illicit mining crucially relies on communication between compromised systems and remote mining pools using the de facto standard protocol Stratum. While prior research primarily focused on endpoint-based detection of in-browser mining, in this paper, we address network-based detection of cryptomining malware in general. We propose XMR-Ray, a machine learning detector using novel features based on reconstructing the Stratum protocol from raw NetFlow records. Our detector is trained offline using only mining traffic and does not require privacy-sensitive normal network traffic, which facilitates its adoption and integration.In our experiments, XMR-Ray attained 98.94% detection rate at 0.05% false alarm rate, outperforming the closest competitor. Our evaluation furthermore demonstrates that it reliably detects previously unseen mining pools, is robust against common obfuscation techniques such as encryption and proxies, and is applicable to mining in the browser or by compiled binaries. Finally, by deploying our detector in a large university network, we show its effectiveness in protecting real-world systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 非法加密货币挖掘已经成为计算机安全事件货币化的流行方法之一。在这种攻击中，受害者的计算资源被滥用来为攻击者的利益挖掘加密货币。最受欢迎的非法开采的数字硬币是Monero，因为它提供了强大的匿名性，并在CPU上有效地开采。非法开采主要依赖于受损系统和远程矿池之间使用事实上的标准协议层进行通信。虽然以前的研究主要集中在基于端点的浏览器内挖掘检测，但在本文中，我们一般解决基于网络的密码挖掘恶意软件检测。我们提出了XMR-Ray，这是一个机器学习检测器，它使用基于从原始网络流记录中重建地层协议的新特征。我们的检测器仅使用挖掘流量进行离线训练，不需要隐私敏感的正常网络流量，这有利于其采用和集成。在我们的实验中，XMR-Ray在0.05%的误报率下获得了98.94%的检测率，优于最接近的竞争对手。我们的评估还表明，它能够可靠地检测以前未发现的挖掘池，对常见的混淆技术(如加密和代理)具有鲁棒性，并且适用于在浏览器中或通过编译的二进制文件进行挖掘。最后，通过在一个大型大学网络中部署我们的检测器，我们展示了它在保护现实世界系统中的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 利用网络元数据检测非法密码挖掘

papers.title: Byzantine set-union consensus using efficient set reconciliation
papers.authors: Florian Dold, Christian Grothoff
papers.abstract:
AbstractApplications of secure multiparty computation such as certain electronic voting or auction protocols require Byzantine agreement on large sets of elements. Implementations proposed in the literature so far have relied on state machine replication and reach agreement on each individual set element in sequence.We introduce set-union consensus, a specialization of Byzantine consensus that reaches agreement over whole sets. This primitive admits an efficient and simple implementation by the composition of Eppstein’s set reconciliation protocol with Ben-Or’s ByzConsensus protocol.A free software implementation of this construction is available in GNUnet. Experimental results indicate that our approach results in an efficient protocol for very large sets, especially in the absence of Byzantine faults. We show the versatility of set-union consensus by using it to implement distributed key generation, ballot collection, and cooperative decryption for an electronic voting protocol implemented in GNUnet.
 This is a revised and extended version of a paper published under the same title at ARES 2016.
papers.abstract_zh:
安全多方计算的应用，如某些电子投票或拍卖协议，需要对大量元素达成拜占庭协议。到目前为止，文献中提出的实现依赖于状态机复制，并按顺序对每个单独的集合元素达成一致。我们引入集合-联合共识，这是拜占庭共识的一种专门化，它在整个集合上达成一致。该原语通过将Eppstein的set调和协议与Ben-Or的ByzConsensus协议相结合，提供了一种高效而简单的实现方式。GNUnet提供了这种结构的免费软件实现。实验结果表明，我们的方法产生了一个非常大的集合有效的协议，特别是在没有拜占庭错误。我们展示了集合并共识的多功能性，用它来实现在GNUnet中实现的电子投票协议的分布式密钥生成、选票收集和合作解密。
这是在ARES 2016上发表的同名论文的修订和扩展版本。
papers.title_zh: 使用有效集合协调的拜占庭集合联合一致性

2015.journals_title: EURASIP Journal on Information Security, Volume 2015

papers.title: Laribus: privacy-preserving detection of fake SSL certificates with a social P2P notary network
papers.authors: Karl-Peter Fuchs, Dominik Herrmann, Andrea Micheloni, Hannes Federrath
papers.abstract: In this paper we present Laribus, a peer-to-peer network designed to detect local man-in-the-middle attacks against secure socket layer/transport layer security (SSL/TLS). With Laribus, clients can validate the authenticity of a certificate presented to them by retrieving it from different vantage points on the network. Unlike previous solutions, clients do not have to trust a central notary service nor do they have to rely on the cooperation of website owners. The Laribus network is based on a social network graph, which allows users to form notary groups that improve both privacy and availability. It integrates several well-known techniques, such as secret sharing, ring signatures, layered encryption, range queries, and a distributed hash table (DHT), to achieve privacy-aware queries, scalability, and decentralization. We present the design and core components of Laribus, discuss its security properties, and also provide results from a simulation-based feasibility study.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们介绍了Laribus，这是一个对等网络，旨在检测针对安全套接字层/传输层安全性(SSL/TLS)的本地中间人攻击。有了Laribus，客户可以通过从网络上的不同有利位置检索证书来验证提交给他们的证书的真实性。与以前的解决方案不同，客户不必信任中央公证服务，也不必依赖网站所有者的合作。Laribus网络基于一个社交网络图，它允许用户组成公证小组，以提高隐私和可用性。它集成了几种众所周知的技术，如秘密共享、环签名、分层加密、范围查询和分布式哈希表(DHT ),以实现隐私感知查询、可伸缩性和去中心化。我们介绍了Laribus的设计和核心组件，讨论了它的安全属性，并提供了基于模拟的可行性研究的结果。
papers.title_zh: Laribus:使用社交P2P公证网络的假SSL证书的隐私保护检测
